message.content:
1. Laparoscopic pyeloplasty has the disadvantage of longer operative time.
2. Laparoscopic pyeloplasty requires significant skill of intracorporeal knotting.
3. Laparoscopic pyeloplasty is here to stay.
4. Laparoscopic pyeloplasty represents an emerging standard of care.

messages.content:
Statement: Although, laparoscopic pyeloplasty has the disadvantages of longer operative time and requires significant skill of intracorporeal knotting but it is here to stay and represents an emerging standard of care.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
